entry.title: Calisthenics Anti-Slip Tech-Touch Fitness Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Workout Wear
Price: 14.95

● Designed, based & serviced in California
● Antimicrobial Zinc Oxide/ Self Sanitizing
● Slip Proof Design
● Tech-Touch Fingertips
● Odor-Proof Technology
● Reflective Strip

Get extra grip with a pair of Anti-Slip Fitness Gloves featuring Antimicrobial Zinc Oxide protection. The treated fabric repels germs and bacteria from your hands allowing you to wipe away sweat or grip unsanitized gear while remaining fresh. Anti-slip panels throughout the palms offer extra grip while running, hiking, biking, strength training, calisthenic workouts, practicing cardio, performing gravity-defying exercises and more. Slip the glove onto your wrist and secure the fit with a heavy-duty self-fastening strap. The index finger and thumb tips are touch screen smartphone-sensitive to keep you connected.

Made in Taiwan

Materials: Microfiber, Ottoman, Neoprene

Care: Hand wash cold. Lay flat to dry. Do not iron.

Warranty: 1 Year Manufacturer Guarantee

Antimicrobial Tech-Touch Padded Weight Lifting Workout Gloves offer extra-grip and a full-finger design with plush padding to keep your hands intact from calluses and abrasions. Made with ventilated antimicrobial fabric to repel germs and bacteria from sweat and dirty gym equipment while maintaining a fresh scent. Easy to adjust, slip and off with self fastening wrist strap and pull. Stay connected between sets with smartphone-sensitive touch screen tips on the index finger and thumb.

Materials: Lycra, Microfiber, SBR, Polyester, Ottoman

Care: Machine wash cold. Lay flat to dry. Do not iron.

Warranty: 1 Year Manufacturer Guarantee

entry.title: NonZero Gravity NZ-P12Ti Titanium Calf Compression Sleeves
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Compression Garments
Price: 24.00

  • Compression sleeves keep muscles warm and prevent swelling
  • Includes Titanium panels over calf muscles: an advanced sports medicine approach proven effective in increasing range of motion and speeding recovery time by University of Gloucestershire UK, Massey University NZ and Griffith University AU researchers
  • Ventilation, quick-dry tech materials allow skin to breathe and wick moisture
  • Comfortable cuffs and flat seam stitching prevent chafing and keep sleeves properly positioned
  • Protects shins from scratches and abrasions

Equip yourself like the pros with NonZero Gravity NZ-P12Ti Titanium Calf Compression Sleeves.

 

Titanium is all the rage among professional athletes, and now you can make it part of your regimen for training, competition and recovery, in support of your active lifestyle, or simply to more effectively soothe muscle aches and promote healing. 

 

The advantages of compression garments in promoting strong circulation, keeping muscles warm, and the prevention of swelling are already well known, but adding Titanium kicks the effectiveness of the garments up a notch.  In studies conducted by University of Gloucestershire UK, Massey University NZ and Griffith University AU researchers, use of Titanium support tape by athletes during hard workouts was shown to increase post-workout range of motion by reducing stiffness, and to speed full muscle strength recovery time. 

 

These sleeves are designed to zone in anatomically around your shins and calves for precise compression to enhance circulation.  Specially placed, ventilated Titanium panels add extra protection and support for calf muscles.  The quick-drying fabric keeps you cool and wicks away moisture.  Flat seams and comfortable cuffs prevent chafing and keep the sleeves properly positioned.

 

Ideal for those who suffer from calf pain, leg pain, shin splints and muscle aches, or as added support during sports, hiking, gym workouts and other physically demanding activities.  Those who suffer from lower leg edema due to long hours of standing or sitting, long flights or medical conditions will also welcome the relief these sleeves can bring.

 

Get back to your best game with NonZero Gravity’s Titanium Calf Compression Sleeve.

Sold by the pair. 

 

Materials: 80% Nylon, 20% Spandex. 

Adult Sizes: M - XXL

Warning: Do not apply over open wounds.

 

Made in Taiwan.

entry.title: NonZero Gravity Knee Strap
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Workout Wear
Price: 6.95

  • Tubular buttress provides mild compression at patellar tendon that reduces dynamic forces caused by jumping, running and bending.
  • Adjustable strap and flexible unique tubular buttress for extra support, comfortable fit that guides your knee caps on proper position.
  • Offers protection and alleviate minor and moderate ligament instabilities, fatigue and inflammation.
  • Lightweight and breathable neoprene makes it ultra-comfortable even for prolonged wear.
  • One size fits most, left or right leg.

NonZero Gravity answers your need for great protection on and off the courts.

 

We have put so much thought into the design of our unique, flexible tubular buttress knee strap.  It provides exceptional comfort and relief that will ensure to keep and stabilized your knee caps in the right place, improve patellar tracking; on and off the courts.  It helps to reduce the irritation and inflammation due to excessive patella movement, protects your knees during sport activities, such as squatting, jumping and running.  This unique tubular is flexible yet firm that provide support, mild compression to reduce pain, fatigue, patella stress and reduce discomfort during any type of knee movement.

 

Velcro adjustable strap that prevents loosening and allows precise comfort fitting, enhance ability to perform at peak level.  Latex-free1 neoprene construction.  Easy to care, durable, machine washable in cold water temperature, flat dry.  Universal fit, left or right leg and one size fits most 11”~17” in knee circumference.

 

Materials: 5% Polyester, 50% Neoprene, 45% Nylon

 

1 Latex-Free Neoprene - not made by natural rubber latex
